title: Knoll 3 Seater Sofa Premium Leather/Black
body: Widely considered as mid-century modern design classics, the Knoll 3 Seater Sofa was first conceived in 1956. Ultra-sleek and inviting, the angular profile of the Florence Knoll Lounge Range brought comfort in many homes and lounges since it was first introduced. A perfect blend of modern and mid-century furniture, its sleek and beautiful figure compliments any space.
